captions.text: I just...
Get out

Go, if you're not a dog
go away when I tell you

Your smile get into me 
Step by step

You were like an intruder 
What did you do to me

My heart want your love 
I can’t stop myself any more
No way out

You are too amazing, 
There is no way out

That word saying frozen heart 
It melts in my heart
It’s a mystery I fall in to you
As I try to push you away

I go closer to you then I stop 
There’s no doubt

You open to door 
to my heart like magic

Everyday You’re 
strange breath blows
I wanna be with you

My heart is bigger 
than yesterday

Your smile get into me 
Step by step

You were like an intruder 
What did you do to me

My heart want your love 
I can’t stop myself any more
No way out

You are too amazing, 
There is no way out

There was no 
sound from my heart
But it bounces in my ears now

I breathe for you and my 
heart only remembers you

The memories that has 
been left as a scar
Is disappearing in your smile

Everyday You’re strange breath blows 
I wanna be with you

My heart is bigger 
than yesterday

Your smile get into me 
Step by step

You were like an intruder 
What did you do to me

My heart want your love 
I can’t stop myself any more
No way out

You are too amazing, 
There is no way out

Come to me a little bit closer
Come to me

Be my love, 
You are like a sun, unstoppable
This love

comments.text:
Jung Dongha oppa~ His voice is so deep and beautiful, I love it. Am I the 
only one who doesn't think that his voice looks like Hongki's? I mean, both 
are husky, but Hongki's voice is more high-pitched, while Dongha's voice is 
deeper.﻿

comments.text:
This is seriously one of my favorite songs and Jung Dongha is definitely my 
favorite singer ever. His voice makes me feel goosebumps all the way. I 
also love it when he sings it live. So powerful.
By the way, am I the only one who doesn't think that his voice looks like 
Hongki's? They probably use similiar methods, but Jung Dongha's voice 
sounds more powerful and husky.﻿
